Name: Wonky Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare pink grapefruit zest for garnish.
Express pink grapefruit zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sweet, wet Vodkatini invigorated with vanilla and grapefruit.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Wonky Martini contains 205 calories
